## rds-grid-col Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                        | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `colspan`   | `colspan`    | The number of columns this column spans from the smallest breakpoint and above.    | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colspanLg` | `colspan-lg` | The number of columns this column spans from the large breakpoint and above.       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colspanMd` | `colspan-md` | The number of columns this column spans from the medium breakpoint and above.      | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colspanXl` | `colspan-xl` | The number of columns this column spans from the extra large breakpoint and above. | `string` | `undefined` |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                          |
| ---- | ------------------------------------ |
|      | Used to add content to the grid col. |


----------------------------------------------

_Built for Resilience Design System @ FM Global_
